mapper.select: SELECT v.vacation_id, u.emp_email, u.emp_name, v.vacation_type, v.start_date, v.end_date, v.vacation_day, v.comment, v.status FROM Vacation v INNER JOIN Request r ON v.request_idx = r.request_idx INNER JOIN Employee e ON r.emp_idx = e.emp_idx INNER JOIN Users u ON e.user_idx = u.user_idx WHERE u.remove = 0 ORDER BY v.start_date DESC
